info.name: HR Management System API
info.description: API collection for the HR Management System with authentication, user management, role management, staff management, forms framework, and comprehensive appraisal system features.

exec: console.log('Could not extract access token from response');
console.log('No access token found in environment');
// Optionally run login request here if needed

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Leave Request Form",
  "description": "Form for requesting leave",
  "form_type": "leave_request",
  "branch_id": 1,
  "fields": [
    {
      "field_name": "leave_type",
      "field_label": "Type of Leave",
      "field_type": "select",
      "is_required": true,
      "options": ["Annual", "Sick", "Casual"],
      "field_order": 1
    },
    {
      "field_name": "start_date",
      "field_label": "Start Date",
      "field_type": "date",
      "is_required": true,
      "field_order": 2
    },
    {
      "field_name": "end_date",
      "field_label": "End Date",
      "field_type": "date",
      "is_required": true,
      "field_order": 3
    },
    {
      "field_name": "reason",
      "field_label": "Reason for Leave",
      "field_type": "textarea",
      "is_required": true,
      "field_order": 4
    }
  ]
}

item.name: Get Form Submissions by Form ID

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Updated Productivity Index",
  "description": "Updated measure of work output",
  "data_type": "percentage",
  "formula": "calculateAttendanceRate",
  "data_source": "attendance_module",
  "categories": ["Teacher", "Sales", "Inventory", "Technician"],
  "is_active": true
}

{
  "name": "Sales Target Achievement",
  "description": "Percentage of sales target achieved",
  "formula": "calculateOverallPerformance",
  "weight": 35.00,
  "metric_ids": [1, 2],
  "categories": ["Sales"],
  "is_active": true
}

{
  "name": "Updated Sales Target Achievement",
  "description": "Updated percentage of sales target achieved",
  "formula": "calculateOverallPerformance",
  "weight": 40.00,
  "metric_ids": [1, 2],
  "categories": ["Sales"],
  "is_active": true
}
